FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: START-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Requested start time of the messages to be retrieved from the Message Archive

FIELD.NAME: STOP-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Requested stop time of the messages to be retrieved from the Message Archive. Defaults to the end of the Message Archive.

FIELD.NAME: DELIVER-VIA-REFERENCE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the data will be referenced by a URI in the single response message. Defaults to No.

FIELD.NAME: DELIVER-VIA-INCLUDE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the data is to be included in the single response message. Defaults to Yes.

FIELD.NAME: PROD-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the product being requested

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type and subtype being requested. (See Table 4-29. Product Categories)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in the Product Message.

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Location where the requesting component is asking for the product file(s) to be stored. Could be a web address, directory or folder specification

FIELD.NAME: NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the name of the output file

FIELD.NAME: DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file format

FIELD.NAME: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version of the file

FIELD.NAME: SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum size of the file acceptable to the requester. Size specified in KB.

FIELD.NAME: REQ-STRING
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specific to the responder / provider of the requested information. The string will define a database query, a script expression, Unix statement, or some other statement for extracting the information from the providerâ€™s repository.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MSGS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of different message type / subtype pairs requested from the Message Archive.

FIELD.NAME: MSG.1.TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message Type/Subtype pairing to identify the message to be retrieved from the archive.

FIELD.NAME: MSG.1.TIME-FIELD-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of field in the message that contains the time to examine. Will default to PUBLISH-TIME in Info. Bus Header.

FIELD.NAME: MSG.1.TIME-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the format of the time to examine in the retrieved messages. Defaults to GMSEC standard time format.

FIELD.NAME: MSG.1.NUM-OF-FIELDS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of message fields to examine and match for retrieval from the archive

FIELD.NAME: MSG.1.FIELD.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the message field to match for retrieval from the archive

FIELD.NAME: MSG.1.FIELD.1.CONTENT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Contents of the message field used in matching the messages for retrieval from the archive
